reactions.name: Melt
reactions.description:
When Pyro meets Cryo, Melt occurs. The effects of Cryo and Pyro will dissipate when Melt occurs.
Melt itself does not inflict DMG. However, the Pyro or Cryo attack that triggers Melt deals increased DMG.
reactions.effect: Damage dealt by the Pyro attack is multiplied by 1.5.

reactions.name: Overloaded
reactions.description: When Pyro meets Electro, Overloaded occurs. The resulting explosion deals AoE Pyro DMG, and tears effortlessly through otherwise sturdy objects.

reactions.name: Vaporize
reactions.description:
When Pyro meets Hydro, Vaporize occurs. The effects of Pyro and Hydro will dissipate when Vaporize occurs.
Vaporize itself does not inflict DMG. However, the Pyro or Hydro attack that triggers Vaporize deals increased DMG.
reactions.effect: Damage dealt by the Pyro attack is multiplied by 1.5.
